snippet: Marshall went on trial in a federal lawsuit brought by a California woman who said he punched her in the face outside a Manhattan nightclub in 2012.
abstract: New York Jets receiver Brandon Marshall goes on trial in Manhattan for allegedly assaulting California woman in 2012; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marshall went on trial in a federal lawsuit brought by a California woman who said he punched her in the face outside a Manhattan nightclub in 2012.
